column5: I can not stop crying. I am so sorry this happened to her, she sounds like one of those few people in the world that lights everything up. The world is cruel, and you don't deserve this pain. I hate whoever did this to her and to you and all the other friends and family that have been affected. I am so sorry. I am so angry. I am so heartbroken. Keep moving forward, it is what she would want for you. You are still strong, despite all of this.
